column4: The best way to do that isn't really Ubuntu related. Store the email messages on the email server, using IMAP account type. Then you can access the same mailbox in the same state from both ubuntu and your android.
For other Android related questions, you can try an Android help site, like http://android.stackexchange.com
Ah, ok. Calendar and contacts. Sorry, I don't know much about them on Ubuntu side.
